capability.name: Financialmarketresearch
capability.definition: The service domain consolidates external financial market research
capability.role: Consolidate financial market information from a variety of sources and optionally organize the consolidated information to align to different topics or categories for subsequent selection and analysis (see Financial Market Analysis)
capability.example: An investment portfolio manager obtains financial market research to support portfolio rebalancing decisions

key_features.name: Identify and subscribe to financial market research services
key_features.description: Enables identify and subscribe to financial market research services to support the service domain consolidates external financial market research

key_features.name: Operate access to financial market research service to obtain reports
key_features.description: Enables operate access to financial market research service to obtain reports to support the service domain consolidates external financial market research

key_features.name: Consolidate, classify and maintain research
key_features.description: Enables consolidate, classify and maintain research to support the service domain consolidates external financial market research

key_features.name: Provide access to financial market research within the bank (direct and for analysis)
key_features.description: Enables provide access to financial market research within the bank (direct and for analysis) to support the service domain consolidates external financial market research

key_features.name: Support ad-hoc requests to identify and obtain financial market research
key_features.description: Enables support ad-hoc requests to identify and obtain financial market research to support the service domain consolidates external financial market research
